content:
at the beginning of the season the UMass Boston womens soccer team was in dire need of a goalie PERIOD

 games into the season and they just might have found one in Junior Michelle Cain PERIOD

After recording her first shutout of her career on September  against Becker Cain recorded her second only  days later against Eastern Connecticut PERIOD She has now extended her consecutive minutes without a goal allowed streak to  PERIOD

Cain also currently leads the LEC in goals against average and save percentage PERIOD
